name: Metformin
details: First-line oral hypoglycemic for Type 2 Diabetes. Lowers glucose production in the liver. Low risk of hypoglycemia.

name: Lisinopril
details: Used for hypertension and heart failure. Provides renal protection, especially in diabetic patients. Monitor for cough and hyperkalemia.

name: Atorvastatin
details: Lowers LDL cholesterol and triglycerides. Stabilizes plaques. Indicated for high-risk ASCVD patients. Monitor LFTs.

name: Aspirin (Low Dose)
details: Inhibits platelet aggregation. Used for primary and secondary prevention of cardiovascular events. Assess bleeding risk.

name: Ozempic (Semaglutide)
details: Injectable for Type 2 Diabetes. Promotes weight loss and provides significant cardiovascular benefits. NOT IN FORMULARY (Requires special authorization).

name: Jardiance (Empagliflozin)
details: Oral hypoglycemic. Provides cardiovascular and renal benefits by promoting glucose excretion. Monitor for UTIs and euglycemic DKA.
